Module com.lmax.solana4j
Package com.lmax.solana4j.programs

Class TokenProgramBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lmax.solana4j.programs.TokenProgramBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Token2022Program, TokenProgram
    public abstract class TokenProgramBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for managing token operations on the Solana blockchain.

    This class defines the common operations for interacting with Solana token programs, including minting tokens, transferring tokens, initializing accounts, and managing authorities.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  TokenProgramBase.AuthorityType
      Enumeration of authority types for the Solana token program.
      static class  TokenProgramBase.TokenProgramBaseFactory
      Factory class for managing token program operations with a TransactionBuilder.

      • INITIALIZE_MINT_INSTRUCTION

        public static final int INITIALIZE_MINT_INSTRUCTION
        The instruction code for initializing a mint.

        This constant defines the instruction code used to initialize a new mint in the Solana token program.

        public static final int SET_AUTHORITY_INSTRUCTION

                                                PublicKey mint,
                                                PublicKey owner)
        Initializes a new token account.
        Parameters:
        account - the public key of the new account
        mint - the public key of the mint
        owner - the public key of the account owner
        Returns:
        TransactionInstruction of the created instruction

      • initializeMint

        public TransactionInstruction initializeMint​(PublicKey tokenMintAddress,
                                             byte decimals,
                                             PublicKey mintAuthority,
                                             java.util.Optional<PublicKey> freezeAuthority)
        Initializes a new mint.
        Parameters:
        tokenMintAddress - the public key of the token mint address
        decimals - the number of decimals for the new mint
        mintAuthority - the public key of the mint authority
        freezeAuthority - the public key of the freeze authority (optional)
        Returns:
        TransactionInstruction of the created instruction
